Description: XDATA, a program run out of in the Information Innovation Office (I2O), is developing an open source software library for big data. Its programs and publications focus on the areas of Analytics, Visualization and Infrastructure.

XDATA, a program run out of in the Information Innovation Office (I2O), is developing an open source software library for big data to overcome the challenges of effectively scaling its volume and characteristics. The program is developing the tools and techniques to process and analyze large sets of imperfect, incomplete data. Its programs and publications focus on the areas of Analytics, Visualization, and Infrastructure to efficiently fuse, analyze, and disseminate these massive volumes of data.
